name: Robots&Ropes
description:
Two robots scaping from the live they always know. They want to live new adventures, they want to live!!!

CONTROLS

-1º player- (color: blue)

  • Move: W A S D 
  • Pute rope:  E + W (up),  E + S (down)

-2º player- (color: red)

  • Move: Arrows
  • Create rope: Right Ctrl

1º player only have 1 rope if you need more you have to ask your teammate (2º player)!!

Game made by:

Alex (twitter @AlexStrikeOLD)

Mawyn(@Maawyn)

We hope you enjoy it very much <3

Pd: #WIP We are making a guide if you get stuck on some rooms!!
